name: Milton's Organic Crackers, Multi-Grain - Certified Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher, Made With 4 Whole Grains & 3 Seeds, Great for Charcuterie Boards - 6 Oz
short_description: STEP UP YOUR CHARCUTERIE GAME - Milton's Organic Multi-Grain Crackers are distinctively savory yet slightly sweet and baked to light, crispy perfection. They're simple, satisfying, and deliciously organic.

MADE FROM PREMIUM INGREDIENTS - Milton's Organic Crackers are made from premium, wholesome ingredients that are responsibly sourced and are produced in a facility that does not process tree nuts or peanuts.

DELICIOUS YOU CAN FEEL GOOD ABOUT - USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, these thin and crispy crackers stand out at any occasion. The delicious combination of grains, seeds, and savory seasonings are the perfect pairing for your favorite cheeses, meats, and spreads.

YOUR GO TO ENTERTAINING CRACKER - Imagine your go-to entertaining cracker - but better. Milton's Organic Crackers are destined to become your new go-to for every flavorful moment, from picnics to parties, from lunchboxes to late-night snacks.

BREAK OUT THE GOOD CRACKERS - It's hard to believe that something as simple as a cracker can change the way you snack and that premium, USDA Certified Organic ingredients can be the life of every party, but it's true! And the delicious proof awaits in every crunch of Milton’s Organic Crackers.

These healthy snacks with a signature woven texture cover all your snacking needs from lunch snacks for kids, vegan snacks for adults, or on the go snacks. Create a vegan food charcuterie board featuring Triscuit vegan crackers, or pair with your favorite dips and spreads.

Available in 10 varieties, Wasa Crispbreads are a great substitute for bread or other snack crackers. Create endless Wasa-bilities with wholesome, oven-baked crispbreads.

name: Finn Crisps Multigrain Crispbread 6.1oz | Thin, Crispy Multigrain Flatbread Crackers | Authentic Finnish Sourdough Crispbread | Multigrain Crackers by Finn Crisp [6.1oz/175gr Box]
short_description: WHOLEGRAIN CRISPBREAD: Try the crispy crunch of Finn Crisp Multigrain Crispbreads crafted from a medley of whole grains. These thin, crunchy crackers offer a burst of fiber and a fresh texture that's a perfect base for a light lunch or a satisfying snack in between meals. Get creative and spread them with an array of mouthwatering toppings to create delightful snack platters, or pair them alongside a charcuterie board. Start your day right with crackers spread with butter or dunked in your tea.

LOW CALORIE, HIGH FIBER: Packed with fiber, these crispbreads will keep you full and satisfied whether you’re on a low fat, low carb, low sugar, keto or vegan diet. A variety of our original rye crispbreads, these multigrain crackers are made with whole grain rye flour, wheat flour, whole grain oat flour, barley flour, water, millet, salt, and yeast. Our Finn Crisps Multigrain crispbreads are certified kosher.

SO VERSATILE: Consider each crispbread a blank canvas for your culinary creations. Best topped with a spread of protein and a layer of fresh fruit or vegetables, the only limit is your imagination! Guacamole and tomatoes, grilled nectarines on ricotta cheese, ham and cheese, or cheddar and lingonberry jam - try something different every time. For more inspiration, check out our recipes page.

MADE IN FINLAND: Baked with whole grain rye flour and sourdough, we prepare these rye thins in Finland using traditional Nordic recipes and techniques. We keep things as simple as possible with no additives, trans fat or GMO, and minimal sugar or salt, just like our ancestors have been doing for years.

FINN CRISP: After years of rye flour and crispbread production, the Finn Crisp brand was officially established and launched at the Helsinki Summer Olympics. We produce our multigrain and rye crispbreads, favorite staples in every Finnish home, with simple, pure ingredients and authentic Finnish baking traditions and recipes.
product_description: Finn Crisp offers this delicious thin multigrain crisp that is unlike another other. Finn Crisp has been a must have in Finnish households since the 1800's. This crispbread baked tradition will have you craving more in no time at all!

name: Back to Nature Stoneground Wheat Crackers, Non-GMO, Plant-Based Snack Cracker, Made with Whole Grains & Flax Seed, Snack Happy, 5oz Box
short_description: DELICIOUSLY TASTY: Our simple crunchy Stoneground Wheat Crackers paris with any and everything! Made with wheat flour and a sprinkle of salt, it packs a salty crispy crunch - perfect for enjoying on its own or topped with your favorite toppings.
KEEPIN' IT REAL: Our products are plant-based with no hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or sweeteners. We are Non-GMO Project Verified.
KEEP ON SNACKIN' ON: America’s classic snacks, remade with honest-to-goodness ingredients. So you can say ‘yes’ to your nostalgic faves.
ITS ALL GOOD: We can’t play favorites — it’s too hard when all our snacks are this tasty and delicious.Try our crackers, cookies, or nut mixes.

BRINGING SUNSHINE TO SNACKTIME SINCE 1960: Born in a small health food store, Back to Nature has been creating remakes of America's classics with plant-based goodness and nostalgic flavors. Radiating good vibes and a sunshine state of mind, Stay golden.
product_description: A flavorful, savory crunch makes these crackers the ideal accompaniment to sweet, creamy cheeses or spicy dips to create a tantalizing blend of tastes and textures. Or, simply crunch into these crackers on their own for a salty snack made with nature’s finest ingredients. Whether you’re getting together with friends or family, good moments and light entertaining call for good food. With Back to Nature products, you can enjoy the good, mouthwatering taste of crackers as you please. Whether you’re pairing Stoneground Wheat Crackers with savory cheese, displaying Pink Himalayan Salt Multigrain Flatbreads on a charcuterie board, spreading guacamole on Sesame Seed Rice Thin Crackers, or pairing Saltines with your favorite warm soups, you can always discover new ways to entertain, share, and enjoy. Our simple ingredients are deliciously inspired by nature. What’s more, you’ll love that this cracker that is Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher, and made with whole grains. Smile knowing you’re giving you and your family great tasting food that has goodness in mind. Back to Nature has been a proud partner of The Nature Conservancy supporting initiatives focused on conservation for more than a decade. We believe a healthier planet leads to healthier and happier people.

With a salty-sweet taste and a crunchy texture, these crispy, thin crackers also contain no artificial flavors and colors. Each serving contains 21 grams of whole grain, making these baked crackers wonderful whole grain snacks for adults. Take cheese and crackers to the next level during relaxing evenings at home with Wheat Thins. Elevate your party snacks pairing these whole grain crackers with dips or adding them to a cheese tray or charcuterie board.

name: Simple Mills Organic Seed Crackers, Original - Gluten Free, Vegan, Healthy Snacks, Paleo Friendly, 4.25 Ounce (Pack of 1)
short_description: One (1) 4.25 oz box of Simple Mills Original Organic Seed Crackers offering a nutritious, flaky cracker crunch, with delicious, satisfying and wholesome ingredients everyone can enjoy

Simple Mills offers healthy snacks with nutrient-dense, purposeful ingredients, and these Non-GMO, USDA Certified Organic crackers are no exception; made with a blend of sunflower, pumpkin and flax seed flour to supercharge your snack.
These versatile crackers have a traditional, flaky cracker crunch and are a delicious snack, topped with your favorite dips and veggies, on a charcuterie board, or with a meal.

Simple Mills Organic Seed Crackers are the perfect organic, gluten free, vegan and paleo snack, offering a nutritious way to add nutrients to your body without compromise, while also furthering regenerative agriculture through building healthy soil.
Made with nothing artificial, ever, and simple ingredients, these seed crackers are USDA Certified Organic, Certified Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Grain Free, Corn Free, Paleo Friendly, Plant Based
product_description: Simple Mills enriches lives and bodies through simple, delicious, real foods. We strive to make healthful choices easy by offering food that tastes great in the moment and nourishes your body for the long-term. We believe if you don’t recognize an ingredient, your body won’t either, so we handpick ours with purpose - only including things that nourish you. Nothing artificial, EVER. We’re here to positively impact the way food is made, because we believe good health enables greater, passion-filled lives. Clean, nutritious foods, for a greater life. It’s that simple. Food has the ability to transform how you feel. We're raising the bar. Raising expectations that food can be both delicious and nourishing, so you can thrive. All Simple Mills products are made in North America [USA and Canada]. sign up for our newsletter on our Simple Mills website so you can keep up to date with our latest news, health tips, and recipes or click on the Blue visit the Simple Mills store link by the product title.
